creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Eduard Skorik and Vlad Arseniy from Vostok SOS loading Taya, 83, to the evacuation train in Pokrovsk, Donetsk region. Today, she and hew husband were evacuated from their home in Chasiv Yar. As Russian troops advancing in Bakhmut area, this city becomes dangerous to stay in, as frequent rusisan shelling can ruin civillian houses, wound or even kill them anytime
